name: Homie Quest!
description:
Controls:

W/D - Left/Right movement

J - Jump, holding J allows for higher jumps

K - Attack, influenced by directional input (WASD)

Ability Controls (Must be unlocked in-game):

; - Chakram, if it collides with you while you are in the air, you bounce off it

L -  Dash, quickly moves you a short distance forward

My first public game!

The menus are buggy and unpolished, though the gameplay is complete. I have decided to move on to other projects, but I'm still happy to release what I hope to be my first of many games!

Apologies for the wacky control scheme, Its what I use for games and I never got around to making a control re-binder.

Special thanks to:

Kaditrix for the music in the game

Russo for assistance with some systems
